solution

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • solution.Utilities

  • class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains useful utilities for calculating weekday occurrences.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Utilities() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static int Count(java.lang.String startIn, java.lang.String endIn, java.lang.String dayIn)
      Method that counts the number of dayIn occurrences between (inclusive) startIn and endIn For example, the number of Wednesdays between December 3rd 2019 and December 25th 2019 is 4.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Utilities

        Utilities()

    • Method Detail

      • Count

        static int Count(java.lang.String startIn,
                 java.lang.String endIn,
                 java.lang.String dayIn)
        Method that counts the number of dayIn occurrences between (inclusive) startIn and endIn For example, the number of Wednesdays between December 3rd 2019 and December 25th 2019 is 4. 
           DECEMBER - 2019
 Su|Mo|Tu[We]Th|Fr|Sa
 --------------------
 01|02[03|--|05|06|07
 08|09|10|--|12|13|14
 15|16|17|--|19|20|21
 22|23|24|--]26|27|28
 29|30|31|xx|xx|xx|xx
        Parameters:
        startIn - the yyyy-MM-dd start date to test weekday occurrences
        endIn - the yyyy-MM-dd end date to test weekday occurrences
        dayIn - the actual day-of-the-week (Sunday -- Saturday) to hold the recurring meeting
        Returns:
        an integer count of the number of occurrences of dayIn found between startIn and endIn
